title: What are haunting or hummable melodies in Tamil? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A Ram Kumar G Sir. There are lots of melodies in Tamil thanks to Illayaraja, A. R. R. and many music directors. Here are few melodies which I love, Thendral Vanthu theendum…  Nila kaigarathu…  Kaane kailaimaane…  Mandran vantha thendral… (I would suggest all the songs of this movie “Mauna Ragam")  Pottu vecha oru vatta nila…  Sangeetha Swarngal…  Anbendra mazhiaila…  Kulalothum kananuku…  Pachai nerame…  Kanathil muthamitaal…  Kaatre en vaasal vantha…  Kaadhal ennulle  Azhage azhge ellaam…  Yaayum yaayum… (When I heard this one for the first time I didn't even grasp the lyrics it was the musical that touch me)  It's a tough job to select few. I feel I missed many songs.
